onExternalDragIn Event

Parameters:

  • id - id of event
  • source - source html object, which was dragged in the scheduler
  • e - native DOM event object 
  scheduler.attachEvent("onExternalDragIn", function (id, source){
         scheduler.getEvent(id).text = source.innerHTML;
         return true;
  });

Event can be used to customize newly created event ( which is a result of drag-in operation )
Blockable, if event returns false - dragged in element will not produce a new event
